
```{r}
# Get the full correlation matrix
cov_mat <- resid(UWES_replicated_errors, "cor")$cov

# Lower-triangular (below diagonal, exclude diagonal)
lower_cov <- cov_mat
lower_cov[upper.tri(lower_cov, diag = TRUE)] <- NA

# Convert to data frame for apa_table
lower_df <- as.data.frame(lower_cov)

# Optional: drop rows with all NA
lower_df <- lower_df[rowSums(!is.na(lower_df)) > 0, ] %>% 
  mutate_all(~replace(., is.na(.),  " "))

# Now use apa_table
apa_table(lower_df,
          caption = "Lower-triangular correlations between residuals",
          note = "UWES = Utrecht Work Engagement Scale")
```
